title: Rehoboam Strengthens Judah
summary: After the kingdom splits, Rehoboam plans to attack Israel but is stopped by God's word. He fortifies Judah’s cities and strengthens his reign. Many priests and Levites migrate to Judah, strengthening the kingdom spiritually.

faq.question: Why didn’t Rehoboam attack Israel?
faq.answer: God told him not to fight his fellow Israelites, and he obeyed.

faq.question: Why did priests and Levites move to Judah?
faq.answer: Because Jeroboam rejected them and set up his own priesthood.
